APR FC vs Club Africain FC

APR FC 0-0 Club Africain

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:24

Umukino urangiye amakipe yombi anganya ubusa ku busa

Umukino ubanza wahuzaga APR FC na Club Africain urangiye nta kipe ishoboye kureba mu izamu ry'indi. Umukino wo kwishyura uzabera kuri Stade Olympique de RadÃ¨s iri mu Mujyi wa Tunis muri Tunisia.

17:23

92' Amahirwe ya nyuma ya APR FC

Koruneri ya APR FC itewe na Muhadjiri Hakizimana ayitereka ku kirenge cya Issa Bigirimana wari wenyine ariko ntiyashobora kuboneza mu izamu. Atera iruhande rw'izamu ririnzwe na Charfi.

17:21

90' Iminota itatu y'inyongera

Abakinnyi ba APR FC ntibishimiye uburyo umusifuzi yemeje iminota itatu y'inyongera nyamara hari abakinnyi benshi ba Club Africain bagiye baryama batinza iminota

17:19

89' Imbere y'izamu rya APR FC birakomeye

Rutahizamu w'umunya-Ghana Derick Sasraku asigaranye n'umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves ariko ntiyaboneza mu izamu atera ku ruhande

17:18

84' Ibibazo muri ba rutahizamu bitumye APR FC yitabaza umukinnyi mushya kandi muto

Mugunga Yves w'imyaka 18 yonyine APR FC yavanye mu ishuri ry'umupira w'amaguru ryayo asimbuye Nshuti Savio wagaragazaga umunaniro. Uyu rutahizamu ahawe umwanya kuko Byiringiro Lague na Sugira Ernest bashoboraga gukoreshwa ariko ntibakinnye kubera ibibazo by'uburwayi

17:14

Gusimbuza kwa nyuma ku ruhande rwa Club Africain

Umutoza wa Club Africain yongereye imbaraga mu bwugarizi, ashobora kuba ashaka kurinda inota rimwe ryo kunganyiriza i Kigali. Wisem Ben Yahya ukina inyuma asimbuye Ayoub Ben Machrek

17:10

78' APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Emmanuel Imanishimwe bita Mangwende azamukanye umupira neza agera imbere y'izamu ariko ntiyigirira icyizere ngo atere mu izamu awuhindura ashaka ba rutahizamu barimo Nsengiyumva Moustapha wari imbere y'izamu wenyine ariko atinda kuwugeraho myugariro Bilel Efa arawumutanga arawurenza

17:06

75' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Club Africain

Kabuhariwe Khefifi Bilel asimbuwe na Zouhaiere Daouhadi. Bari kongera imbaraga mu bakinnyi bo hagati kuko ari ho umukino uri gukinirwa muri iyi minota

17:01

70' Umuvuduko wo gusatira APR FC yari ifite wagabanutse

Nubwo umutoza Jimmy Mulisa yamaze kongeramo Moustapha Nsengiyumva na Issa Bigirimana ngo bongere imbaraga mu busatirizi nta mipira bari kubona ahubwo umupira uri gukinirwa hagati mu kibuga cyane

16:56

64' Gusimbuza kwa mbere kuri Club Africain

Yassin Chamakhi wari wagoye cyane ba myugariro ba ARP FC asimbuwe na Manoubbi Haded

16:54

Bravo kuri Mukura Victory Sports

Mu mukino wa CAF Confederation Cup wahuzaga Mukura VS na Free State Stars yo muri Afurika y'epfo waberaga i Johannesburg urangiye amakipe yombi anganya 0-0. Umukino wo kwishyura uzabera kuri stade Huye tariki 5 Ukuboza 2018

16:51

58' APR FC isimbuje ku nshuro ya kabiri

Nyuma yo kutitwara neza mu minota yakinnye, Iranzi Jean Claude asimbujwe Nsengiyumva Moustapha APR FC yabanye muri Police FC mu mpeshyi y'uyu mwaka

16:48

56' Club Africain ifite amakosa menshi mu bwugarizi

Jaziri akoreye ikosa Savio Nshuti wageragezaga gusatira izamu ry'Abarabu haboneka Coup franc ariko Muhadjiri Hakizimana ayitera hejuru y'izamu

16:46

Amwe mu mafoto y'igice cya mbere

16:45

54' Gusimbuza kwa mbere kwa APR FC

Fiston Nkinzingabo ukina ku ruhande rw'iburyo asatira asimbuwe na Issa Bigirimana

16:43

53' Abakinnyi batatu ba APR FC bagiye kwishyushya

Umutoza Jimmy Mulisa ahagurukije; Issa Bigirimana, Moustapha Nsengiyumva na Evode Ntwari

16:37

47' Ikarita ya mbere y'umuhondo

Umunya-Cameroun Ibrahim Mouchili akoreye ikosa Iranzi Jean Claude bituma ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo ya mbere muri uyu mukino. Iranzi ahagurutse ashwana nawe ariko barabakiza

16:35

Igice cya kabiri cy'umukino

Iminota 45 y'umukino itangijwe na Muhadjiri Hakizimana wa APR FC

16:21

Igice cya mbere kirangiye amakipe yombi anganya

Nubwo amakipe yombi yagerageje gusatira ariko ba myugariro b'impande zombi bitwaye. Igice cya mbere kirangiye nta irareba mu izamu ry'indi

16:16

Iminota ibiri y'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Umusifuzi w'umunya-Eswatini yemeje ko hongerwaho iminota ibiri kuko iminota 45 ya mbere y'umukino irarangiye

16:14

42' APR FC ihinduye uburyo bw'imikinire

Umutoza Jimmy Mulisa asabye abakinnyi be guhindura uburyo bakinaga; Savio Nshuti wakinaga ku ruhande rw'ibumoso ahindura uruhande ajya iburyo, abisikana na Fiston Nkinzingabo utigaragaje muri iki gice cya mbere

16:08

Umukino ubaye uhagaze hari umukinnyi uri kuvurwa

Myugariro Jaziri Fakhreddine agonganye na Iranzi Jean Claude arababara, ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga b'ikipe

16:04

33' Khefifi Bilel ni uwo kwitonderwa

APR FC irarokotse. Ombolenga Fitina usabwa kugarira ku ruhande rw'iburyo yari yazamutse, Club Africain iramutungura ikora 'contre attaque' iciye ku ruhande rwe bawuha Khefifi Bilel ugaragaza ubuhanga budasanzwe awundura imbere y'izamu ariko Kimenyi arongera aratabara. Ujya muri koruneri ariko ntacyo ibyaye.

16:01

28' Abakinnyi ba Club Africain batangiye gusatira

Umupira uzamukanywe na Ali Abdi ukina ku ruhande rw'ibumoso yugarira, awucomekera Khefifi Bilel ucenze Ombolenga Fitina agerageza gutungura umunyezamu ariko Kimenyi Yves amubera ibamba awukuramo

15:55

APR FC imaze iminsi iri mu bihe byiza ariko Club Africain si uko

Mu giheAPR FC igeze ku munsi wa gatanu wa shampiyona iyoboye urutonde rwa shampiyona y'u Rwanda aho yatsinze imikino yose, Club Africain yo iri mu bihe bibi iwabo kuko iri ku mwanya wa munani muri shampiyona

15:53

21' Koruneri ya mbere ya Club Africain

Ku mupira urengejwe na Emmanuel Imanishimwe ubyaye Koruneri ya mbere y'abanya-Tunisia itewe neza na Yassin Chamkhi ariko Herve Rugwiro asumba ba rutahizamu ba Club Africain akuraho umupira

15:50

19' APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Ku bufatanye bwa Butera Andrew na Ombolenga Fitina bahererekanyaga neza, bahaye umupira Muhadjiri nawe ntiyazuyaza awuhindurira Iranzi imbere y'izamu ariko ntiyahita atera mu izamu agerageza kubanza kuwufunga bituma awamburwa na ba myugariro ba Club Africain

15:44

Umutoza w'Amavubi ari mu bihumbi biri muri iyi stade

Kuko APR FC ikinisha abakinnyi b'abanyarwanda 100%, umutoza w'Amavubi Mashami Vincent yaje kureba uko bitwara mu gihe bitegura umukino usoza indi yo gushaka itike y'igikombe cya Afurika bazasura mo Cote d'Ivoire muri Mutarama 2019.

15:38

08' Coup franc ya mbere ya Club Africain

Ku ikosa Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste akoreye Ayoub Ben habonetse coup franc ariko Ghazi Ayadi ayitera hejuru y'izamu, abafana bayo ntabwo babyumva

15:37

05' APR FC itangiye umukino yotsa igitutu

Ba myugariro ba Club Africain bafite akazi katoroshye kubera imbaraga nyinshi APR FC iri gukoresha isatira, aho ihushije igitego cyabazwe ku mupira Emmanuel Imanishimwe acomekeye Savio Nshuti ariko umupira umubana muremure uramurengana

15:33

02' Koruneri ya mbere y'umukino

APR FC niyo ibonye koruneri ya mbere y'umukino itewe na Muhadjiri Hakizimana ariko ba myugariro b'abanyaTunisia bahagarara neza umupira bawukuraho.

Abafana ba APR FC babukereye

Amatsinda y'abafana ba APR FC baturutse mu mpande zitandukanye z'u Rwanda bari gushyigikira ikipe yabo barimo; Intare za APR FC, Online Fan Club n'izindi

15:31

Umukino uratangiye

Umukino utangijwe Club Africain kuri rutahizamu wabo Derick Sasraku

15:29

Abasifuzi bakomoka mu gihugu cy'umwami Mswati III

Abasifuzi bagiye kuyobora uyu mukino ni abanya- Eswatini barimo Thulani Sibandze, Petros Mzikayifani Mbingo na Zamani Thula Simelane.

15:25

Impande zombi zirahigana ubutwari

APR FC itangiranye intego uru rugendo intego yo kugera mu matsinda ku nshuro ya mbere ikanayarenga ikagera muri 1/2 aho ikipe zo mu Rwanda zitaragera, aho Club Africain yo intego ni ukwegukana igikombe

15:23

Amakipe yombi asohotse mu wambariro

Abakinnyi ba Club Africain, ikipe yo mu Mujyi wa Tunis muri Tunisia n'aba APR FC ikipe y'ingabo z'u Rwanda binjiye mu kibuga aho bagiye kubanza kuririmba indirimbo zubahiriza ibihugu byombi mbere yo gutangira umukino

15:20
